content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which there is value in work-life blending.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which there is value in work-life blending.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
